**** Vanaf 25 november in de bioscoop ****
 
Verenigde Staten
Actie / Avontuur

geregisseerd door Edgar Wright
met Michael Cera, Ellen Wong en Mary Elizabeth Winstead

Dutch:
Scott Pilgrim is een 23-jarige nonchalante goedzak, held (in z'n fantasie), wannabe-rockster die bij z'n beste vriend Wallace Wells, de homo, woont. In Toronto. En hij speelt bass in z'n eigen band "Sex Bob-Omb". Wanneer 'new girl in town' Ramona V. Flowers arriveert, is Scott tot over z'n oren verliefd. Maar om een afspraakje met haar te krijgen, moet hij de zeven exen van Ramona verslaan.

English:
Scott Pilgrim plays in a band which aspires to success. He dates Knives Chau, a high-school girl five years his junior, and he hasn't recovered from being dumped by his former girlfriend, now a success with her own band. When Scott falls for Ramona Flowers, he has trouble breaking up with Knives and tries to romance Ramona. As if juggling two women wasn't enough, Ramona comes with baggage: seven ex-lovers, with each of whom Scott must do battle to the death in order to win Ramona.
